job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Contract: 6 Month Contract-to-Hire

Remote: 100% Remote

Interview Process: 30 min video interview/ then 1 hour video interview


This will be a 6-month contract with FTE conversion. This is a 100% remote role, where you will be working on an exciting, cutting-edge team. This position develops efficient and scalable data science systems that enable integration of machine learning (ML) applications into healthcare operations, strategy, value improvement, care advancement, patient safety and satisfaction. This position will partner with data scientists, application developers, data architects, and system engineers to recommend and develop ML systems and pipelines. This position will be responsible for learning, recommending, and implementing cutting edge machine learning methodologies and tools in creative and novel ways.


Qualifications Needed:

  • CI / CD Experience
  • Data Engineering experience (full project life cycle, deployment to production)
  • Data science exposure
